name: Amat-catalyzed Fission-fusion
imageDescription: A spacecraft with spherical WLS lead reradiation shell, spherical ablative SiC thruster nozzle, 480 MWth liquid droplet radiator, antiproton storage ring, target pellet storage ring, and LiH radiation shield/power collector.

name: Amat-initiated H-B Magnetic-inertial
ability: +5 thrust. MINI-BLACK HOLE FUTURE: Req = Industrialized centaur with 10 isotope FTs. Effects = double all isotope refuel, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A high-energy antiproton beam igniting H-B target with fuel tanks, power system, antiproton accelerator with 1 GWth radiators, and magnetic fields inside a 5 cm target with lead shell and H-B fuel halo.

name: Dense Plasma H-B Focus Fusion
imageDescription: An electrostatic-focus aneutronic fusion device with H-B inlet, focus within electrodes, H2 coolant paths, rotating plasma vortex, and regeneratively-cooled magnetic nozzle.

name: Crossfire H-B Focus Fusion
ability: +9 thrust. PROTIUM FUSION FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with H Dirtside. Effects = double all isotope refuel, 10 VP.
imageDescription: A magnetic and electrostatic fusion pinch device with cooling pipe, armature and electrostatic generator, electron guns, klystron/TWT AC energy extraction, and multistage HVDC/DC energy conversion.

name: Levitated Dipole 6Li-H Fusion
imageDescription: A closed-field reactor with magnetic ring floating in hot electron plasma, featuring levitation coil, refrigerated floating ring shielded with W and C-C, Helmholtz shaping coils, and magnetic nozzle.

name: Dusty Plasma
ability: +9 thrust. MASS BEAM FUTURE: Req = Promoted Bernal with Io or Triton Dirtside. Effects = your Powersat adds +2 thrust, 7 VP.
imageDescription: A Cm-245 fission products dust suspended in electric field, with upper and lower paraboloid LiH moderator and IR radiation shield, quadrupole superconducting field coils, and fission fragment annular ring exiting at 3-5%c.

name: Mini-Mag Orion Z-pinch Fission
imageDescription: A classic Orion design modified for tiny nuclear bombs detonated by z-pinch implosions, featuring bomb storage, feed mechanism, 720 GWth radiators, expendable LMTL pulse unit, 72 MJ Marx capacitor bank, and magnetic nozzle.

name: Solem Medusa Tugged Orion
ability: +3 thrust. LITHIATED AMMONIA ICE STARSHIP FUTURE: Req = Ad astra exit with 10 isotope fuel. Effect = 14 VP.
imageDescription: A Medusa design injecting fusion bombs forward into a 400m dia magnetic mirror with 150m dia kevlar spinnaker, featuring 64 TJ bomb hohlraum with D2 rod and solid H2 proton beam, servo winch, and thermionic emitter coils.

name: Salt-water Zubrin
imageDescription: A fission reaction spacecraft with alternating B4C and UBr4/H2O segments, showing water with uranium bromide salts reaching UBr4 critical mass detonation, and open-cycle cooling water.

name: Zubrin-GDM
ability: +8 thrust. SPACEFARING FUTURE: Req = Bernal with 8+ dirtside hydration. Effects = Allowed 1 extra Colonist, 7VP.
imageDescription: A D-T fusion augmented by nuclear salt water fission, featuring USW tank, D2 tanks, Marx, Brayton, MHD systems, 72m magnetic mirror, 4.8 GWth radiator, fore and aft FRC, LiH moderator, uranium salt water halo, and neutral beam injector.

name: Spheromak 3He-D Magnetic Fusion
imageDescription: A spheromak geometry reactor suited for direct thrust and energy conversion with hot plasma inside, 3He-D neutral injection/heating, equilibrium field coils, cold plasma, and magnetic nozzle.

name: Colliding FRC 3He-D Fusion
ability: +10 thrust. ENZMANN STARSHIP FUTURE: Req = Ad astra exit with 2 Promoted Colonists + Mobile Factory. Effect = 12 VP.
imageDescription: A long skinny tandem mirror design with MHD fan direct converter, bow diverter, plasma collision burn cell, theta pinch 3He-D FRC plasma generation and acceleration, 12 T end coil to magnetic nozzle, and stern diverter.

name: VISTA D-T Inertial Fusion
imageDescription: A laser inertial confinement spacecraft with saucer-shaped propellant tanks, landers, power supplies, 5 MJ solid-state DPSSL lasers, conical spike nozzle with 760 MWth radiator, 12 T magnet coil and shield.

name: Daedalus 3He-D Inertial Fusion
ability: +8 thrust. FUSION CANDLE FUTURE: Req = Triton Colony & Promoted Bernal with Neptune Aerostat Dirtside. Effects = double all isotope refuel, 14 VP.
imageDescription: The classic BIS Daedalus design with two-stage configuration, Be dust shield, 3He-D pellet storage, injection gun, 40m dia Mo TZM nozzle-radiator at 1600 K, ICF electron guns, induction pickoff coils, and reaction chamber coils.
